summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Hand Crafted Ceramic Aromatherapy Essential Oil Diffuser,100ml Fragrant Room Sprays Ultrasonic Aroma Mist Atomizer BPA-Free, Waterless Auto Shut-Off and 7 Color Night Lights for Office Home Study Yoga Review Date: 2019/07/16 Store: BRNBW Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'BRNBW', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Special Feature': 'Multiple Light Setting, Automatic Shut Off', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Capacity': '100 Milliliters', 'Product Dimensions': '3.6 x 3.6 x 6.3 inches; 1.12 Pounds', 'UPC': '665059186312'} Review Text: I have a similar diffuser but the cover is plastic, this one is ceramic and it feels and looks so much nicer!
I have another diffuser in bed room and love it so much, wanted to get another one for kitchen.

Ultrasonic aroma diffuser is so much better than candle and room spray in my opinion.
I don't like candle makes fuse and burning smell afterward.
Room spray is overpowering smell at first and doesn't last too long.
On the other hand, diffuser doesn't make fuse,burning smell and smells evenly from begging to end.
This is 100ml size and you think it's small and for only bed room but we live in 2600+ sqft , oepn floor house and when I use this in kitchen, I can still smell in my living room! (I think our ceiling fan help as well.)
This is really great addition for bedroom, living room or entryway!
Lighting is therapeutic at night too!
Totally recommend!! Review Title: Love it Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: BANILA CO Hi Bye Soothing Spot Treatment, 7 Natural Ingredients, Dermatologist-tested, Acne, Daily protection,30ml Review Date: 2020/06/25 Store: BANILA CO Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.09 x 1.34 x 1.3 inches; 3.63 Ounces'} Review Text: It did actually make my pimple a bit smaller next day but what I didn't like was exp date.
All Korean skin care have 2.5 years expiration date from manufacture date. It is Korean law to print exp date or manufacture date on skin care products and makeup products.(Makeup products have 3 years instead of 2.5 years.)
Product I receive is April 2021 exp date, that is only 10 month away and that means this was manufactured on Dec 2018, that sound pretty old as it is June 2020 right now....
Yes it is not expired but I have been using many korean skin care brands and almost always I get the products that have at least 2 years or longer exp date.
This is not something you use every day like toner and I only have 10 month to use and there's no way that I can use whole bottle by April.
I think it's good product but hopefully you'd get longer exp date product than mine so you wouldn't waste your money! Review Title: Wish I received longer exp date.... Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: WeChip 666 Review Date: 2020/07/20 Store: WeChip Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.91 x 3.23 x 2.32 inches; 10.23 Ounces', 'UPC': '726972070413'} Review Text: This is my new beauty gadget!!!
This is amazing!
I knew how great and work the ultrasonic cleaner is because my husband got me a ultrasonic jewelry cleaner years ago and I’ve been loving it ever since.
It really amazes you to see how it can clean your jewelries without any soap and I even use for my glasses.
So when I start to seeing skin scrubber on SNS, I had no doubt that it would work.
And it really did!!! It is amazing!
It makes my skin so clean and soft with just water!! You don’t need to use peeling mask/pads or mud mask to clean your pores!
This is really great beauty gadget and it’s super reasonable!!!!! Review Title: My new beauty gadget!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: [Abib] Creme coating mask Tone-up solution 17g (5pcs) Review Date: 2020/08/29 Store: Abib Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Abib', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Number of Items': '5', 'Package Dimensions': '8.7 x 6.2 x 0.8 inches; 8.01 Ounces'} Review Text: This mask is way too thick and heavy for my taste.
I love korean masks and have been using goodal, dr jart, mediheal, dewycell, huxley, SNP, neogen, dermal and many more brands and this was the worst!
It's way too thick cream and doesn't absorb at all.
After you take the mask off, your face is completely covered with WHITE cream.
I had to wipe off everything!
I really don't uderstand this mask.
Too bad as I love abib Yuja essence and was hoping this would be good but no.
Packaging is simple and good though but that's all to me. Review Title: I did not like this mask Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Dr.Althea Multi-Action Infusion Serum - 56 Packets of Light weight Gel Serum Review Date: 2020/12/04 Store: Dr.Althea Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Dr.Althea', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Protein,Calluses,Anti-aging', 'Package Dimensions': '6.8 x 5.7 x 1.3 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} Review Text: I love these are individually packaged so every time you open, it's fresh and very hygienic.
One packet have generous amount of serum in it and you can use not only for your face but also your neck
and hand. or you can use one packet in the morning and at night, I'd say one packet is for 2 times use instead of once.
It's gel watery feeling serum and not oily or sticky at all which I love.
It makes my skin very hydrate, calm and it doesn't bother even if you wear makeup afterwards.
Overall, I really love this serum and recommend! Review Title: Hygienic packet Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: EASYDEW Starter Moist Whip Foam 5.07 fl oz - Non-Drying, Gentle & Purifying Foaming Cleanser with Ceramide I Exfoliating Daily Face Wash that Removes Dirts and Makeup Review Date: 2021/01/02 Store: EASYDEW Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All, Oily to combination skin, Normal to dry skin, Sensitive to acne-prone skin', 'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Scent': 'Light floral', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '2.28 x 1.81 x 7.01 inches; 6.74 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Cosmax'} Review Text: I've been using Easydew products for a while and every products works on my skin really well!
Their pricing is reasonable but yet effective!
This cleanser is generous size and last for a while.
I have sensitive skin but it didn't cause any irritation or redness so that's good.
I just started using it so I'll update the review in a month or so! Review Title: Love Easydew Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: EASYDEW DW-EGF Double Synergy Moist Ampoule1.01 fl oz -K Beauty Award-Winning Anti Aging Ampoule with EGF to Plump, Moisturize Skin I For Sensitive Skin, Gift for Mom, Wife, Her Review Date: 2021/01/02 Store: EASYDEW Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Anti-aging', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '4.29 x 1.54 x 1.46 inches; 3.53 Ounces'} Review Text: Easydew is a very popular skincare products not only in Korea but also in Japan.
Easydew was created by Korean dermatologist and EasydewEX which is green packaging are only available at dermatologist office.(But you can still find some of the products on Amazon.)
I've been using Easydew ampoule, cleansing foam and moisturizer for a while and love them all.
I wanted to try something new and picked this up.
This really heelp during cold dry winter time and moisturize my skin really well.
It's not oily or sticky at all which I love.
I have sensitive skin but this didn't cause any irritation or redness.
I just started using it so I'll update the review in a month or so but so far it's great ampoule!

Easydew DW-EGF Review Title: Love Easydew Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MEDIHEAL LINE FRIENDS Collagen Impact Essential Mask EX. (Collagen Mask 8 Sheet + 8 Synergy Sheet) - Double Firming & Lifting Synergy with Line Friends Layered Sheet Review Date: 2021/01/03 Store: Mediheal Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mediheal', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Lifting', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Unit Count': '8.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.25 x 4.5 x 1.6 inches; 10.41 Ounces'} Review Text: I use Line app so I'm familiar to these characters and these collabo face mask are SO cute!!!
I love mediheal face mask and have been using for years.
I think Mediheal face mask is the most famous face mask in Korea.
I love their NMF, ipi, HDP, DNA, tea tree and ofcourse these collagen.
Price is reasonable, I never had any skin problem with mediheal mask and trust their brand 100%.
I use mediheal mask every other day and am totally recommend!!! Review Title: Love Mediheal!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Easydew EX Repair Control Renewal Moisture 1.70 fl.oz. Review Date: 2021/02/06 Store: EASYDEW Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive,All Skin Types', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.69 x 2.87 x 2.52 inches; 3.53 Ounces'} Review Text: I love Easydew and have been using their cleanser, ampoule and efg cream for a while and love this cream as well but the cream I received expire in just 4 month!
All other easydew products I got last year(2020) won’t expire until 2023!
Korean skincare have 3 years expiration date since manufactured date so all other easydew products I got last year was manufactured on 2020(same year I got) and pretty fresh but this cream is expired in 4 month that means this was made back in 2018....
Yes, it’s not expired yet but getting 2018 products when it’s 2021 seems kind of bummer.
I only use this cream when my skin feel sensitive or had trouble like pimple and etc and I don’t use everyday but now I feel I have to as it’ll expire in 4 months!
Check the date when you receive! Review Title: Check expiration date. Mine expire in 4 months. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: NIRA Skincare Laser & Serum Bundle - Includes Anti-Aging Laser & Hyaluronic Acid Serum - Reduces Appearance of Fine Lines & Wrinkles - FDA Cleared Review Date: 2021/05/18 Store: Nira Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydration', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Nira'} Review Text: Wow, I really like this beauty gadget!!
I really think it’s working!
It says use 90days or more for best result so
I’ll have to wait and update review but
I feel it’s really working.
I never used laser at home so I was scared but it’s super easy to use and take little time!
I’m still scared to try other than level 1 but even level 1, I do feel warmth and tiny bit pinch feeling.
I believe this gadget is for crow feet but I have small line on my forehead so I’ve been treating that area as well.(if it’s safe for around eye, it’s safe for forehead I hope....)
I like that this is FDA cleared as well.
I’ll update review after 90 days but so far so good!!! Review Title: I really think it’s working! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: A-Cera Barrier Real Skin Fit Mask, Ultra-slim Bio Cellulose Sheet Hyaluronic Acids, Moisture, Firmness, vitality, 0.85 Fl. Oz x 5ea Review Date: 2021/06/09 Store: ARZTIN Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ARZTIN', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '6.34 x 6.18 x 0.98 inches; 8.15 Ounces'} Review Text: I LOVE this mask!!!
Don’t forget to remove the top and bottom fishnet-like cover!!! That part is NOT the mask! (See my pictures)
It fits like a glove! It feels like thin rice paper(lol) but fits to the skin so good!!
I’ve heard so many good thing about Arztin repair cream before and wanted to try but so glad that I tried this mask first!
It hydrate my skin so well and made my skin tone even. My skin feel so smooth and moisturize.
So many sampleS were included! How generous!!
I love this mask so much and am ordering more! Review Title: Don’t forget to peel off the cover sheet! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: beplain Cicaful Calming Pads (60counts) | Centella Hydrating & Soothing Toner Pad | Gentle Facial Peels & Resurfacing Treatment | Daily Exfoliating For Sensitive, Acne Prone Skin | Be Plain Review Date: 2021/10/14 Store: Be Plain Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.07 x 2.52 inches; 9.14 Ounces'} Review Text: It really help calming my skin!
I like this is fragrance free and super gentle for
Sensitive skin.
There’s so much lotion in the jar and pads never gets dry!
I love using this in the morning and makes my skin grow all day too!
Highly recommend! Review Title: It works. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Hand Crafted Ceramic Aromatherapy Essential Oil Diffuser,100ml Fragrant Room Sprays Ultrasonic Aroma Mist Atomizer BPA-Free, Waterless Auto Shut-Off and 7 Color Night Lights for Office Home Study Yoga Review Date: 2019/07/16 Store: BRNBW Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'BRNBW', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Special Feature': 'Multiple Light Setting, Automatic Shut Off', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Capacity': '100 Milliliters', 'Product Dimensions': '3.6 x 3.6 x 6.3 inches; 1.12 Pounds', 'UPC': '665059186312'} Review Text: I have a similar diffuser but the cover is plastic, this one is ceramic and it feels and looks so much nicer!

After you take the mask off, your face is completely covered with WHITE cream.
I had to wipe off everything!
I really don't uderstand this mask.
Too bad as I love abib Yuja essence and was hoping this would be good but no.
Packaging is simple and good though but that's all to me. Review Title: I did not like this mask Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Dr.Althea Multi-Action Infusion Serum - 56 Packets of Light weight Gel Serum Review Date: 2020/12/04 Store: Dr.Althea Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Dr.Althea', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Protein,Calluses,Anti-aging', 'Package Dimensions': '6.8 x 5.7 x 1.3 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} Review Text: I love these are individually packaged so every time you open, it's fresh and very hygienic.
One packet have generous amount of serum in it and you can use not only for your face but also your neck
and hand. or you can use one packet in the morning and at night, I'd say one packet is for 2 times use instead of once.
It's gel watery feeling serum and not oily or sticky at all which I love.
It makes my skin very hydrate, calm and it doesn't bother even if you wear makeup afterwards.
Overall, I really love this serum and recommend! Review Title: Hygienic packet Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: EASYDEW Starter Moist Whip Foam 5.07 fl oz - Non-Drying, Gentle & Purifying Foaming Cleanser with Ceramide I Exfoliating Daily Face Wash that Removes Dirts and Makeup Review Date: 2021/01/02 Store: EASYDEW Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All, Oily to combination skin, Normal to dry skin, Sensitive to acne-prone skin', 'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Scent': 'Light floral', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '2.28 x 1.81 x 7.01 inches; 6.74 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Cosmax'} Review Text: I've been using Easydew products for a while and every products works on my skin really well!
Their pricing is reasonable but yet effective!
This cleanser is generous size and last for a while.
I have sensitive skin but it didn't cause any irritation or redness so that's good.
I just started using it so I'll update the review in a month or so! Review Title: Love Easydew Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: EASYDEW DW-EGF Double Synergy Moist Ampoule1.01 fl oz -K Beauty Award-Winning Anti Aging Ampoule with EGF to Plump, Moisturize Skin I For Sensitive Skin, Gift for Mom, Wife, Her Review Date: 2021/01/02 Store: EASYDEW Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Anti-aging', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '4.29 x 1.54 x 1.46 inches; 3.53 Ounces'} Review Text: Easydew is a very popular skincare products not only in Korea but also in Japan.
Easydew was created by Korean dermatologist and EasydewEX which is green packaging are only available at dermatologist office.(But you can still find some of the products on Amazon.)
I've been using Easydew ampoule, cleansing foam and moisturizer for a while and love them all.
I wanted to try something new and picked this up.
This really heelp during cold dry winter time and moisturize my skin really well.
It's not oily or sticky at all which I love.
I have sensitive skin but this didn't cause any irritation or redness.
I just started using it so I'll update the review in a month or so but so far it's great ampoule!

Easydew DW-EGF Review Title: Love Easydew Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MEDIHEAL LINE FRIENDS Collagen Impact Essential Mask EX. (Collagen Mask 8 Sheet + 8 Synergy Sheet) - Double Firming & Lifting Synergy with Line Friends Layered Sheet Review Date: 2021/01/03 Store: Mediheal Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mediheal', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Lifting', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Unit Count': '8.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.25 x 4.5 x 1.6 inches; 10.41 Ounces'} Review Text: I use Line app so I'm familiar to these characters and these collabo face mask are SO cute!!!
I love mediheal face mask and have been using for years.
I think Mediheal face mask is the most famous face mask in Korea.
I love their NMF, ipi, HDP, DNA, tea tree and ofcourse these collagen.
Price is reasonable, I never had any skin problem with mediheal mask and trust their brand 100%.
I use mediheal mask every other day and am totally recommend!!! Review Title: Love Mediheal!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Easydew EX Repair Control Renewal Moisture 1.70 fl.oz. Review Date: 2021/02/06 Store: EASYDEW Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive,All Skin Types', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.69 x 2.87 x 2.52 inches; 3.53 Ounces'} Review Text: I love Easydew and have been using their cleanser, ampoule and efg cream for a while and love this cream as well but the cream I received expire in just 4 month!
All other easydew products I got last year(2020) won’t expire until 2023!
Korean skincare have 3 years expiration date since manufactured date so all other easydew products I got last year was manufactured on 2020(same year I got) and pretty fresh but this cream is expired in 4 month that means this was made back in 2018....
Yes, it’s not expired yet but getting 2018 products when it’s 2021 seems kind of bummer.
I only use this cream when my skin feel sensitive or had trouble like pimple and etc and I don’t use everyday but now I feel I have to as it’ll expire in 4 months!
Check the date when you receive! Review Title: Check expiration date. Mine expire in 4 months. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: NIRA Skincare Laser & Serum Bundle - Includes Anti-Aging Laser & Hyaluronic Acid Serum - Reduces Appearance of Fine Lines & Wrinkles - FDA Cleared Review Date: 2021/05/18 Store: Nira Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydration', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Nira'} Review Text: Wow, I really like this beauty gadget!!
I really think it’s working!
It says use 90days or more for best result so
I’ll have to wait and update review but
I feel it’s really working.
I never used laser at home so I was scared but it’s super easy to use and take little time!
I’m still scared to try other than level 1 but even level 1, I do feel warmth and tiny bit pinch feeling.
I believe this gadget is for crow feet but I have small line on my forehead so I’ve been treating that area as well.(if it’s safe for around eye, it’s safe for forehead I hope....)
I like that this is FDA cleared as well.
I’ll update review after 90 days but so far so good!!! Review Title: I really think it’s working! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: A-Cera Barrier Real Skin Fit Mask, Ultra-slim Bio Cellulose Sheet Hyaluronic Acids, Moisture, Firmness, vitality, 0.85 Fl. Oz x 5ea Review Date: 2021/06/09 Store: ARZTIN Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ARZTIN', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '6.34 x 6.18 x 0.98 inches; 8.15 Ounces'} Review Text: I LOVE this mask!!!
Don’t forget to remove the top and bottom fishnet-like cover!!! That part is NOT the mask! (See my pictures)
It fits like a glove! It feels like thin rice paper(lol) but fits to the skin so good!!
I’ve heard so many good thing about Arztin repair cream before and wanted to try but so glad that I tried this mask first!
It hydrate my skin so well and made my skin tone even. My skin feel so smooth and moisturize.
So many sampleS were included! How generous!!
I love this mask so much and am ordering more! Review Title: Don’t forget to peel off the cover sheet! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: beplain Cicaful Calming Pads (60counts) | Centella Hydrating & Soothing Toner Pad | Gentle Facial Peels & Resurfacing Treatment | Daily Exfoliating For Sensitive, Acne Prone Skin | Be Plain Review Date: 2021/10/14 Store: Be Plain Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.07 x 2.52 inches; 9.14 Ounces'} Review Text: It really help calming my skin!
I like this is fragrance free and super gentle for
Sensitive skin.
There’s so much lotion in the jar and pads never gets dry!
I love using this in the morning and makes my skin grow all day too!
Highly recommend! Review Title: It works. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Format your response exactly as follows: POSITIVE SUMMARY: [Your positive summary here] NEGATIVE SUMMARY: [Your negative summary here] OVERALL SUMMARY: [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has expressed enthusiasm for several products in their purchase history, highlighting their love for beauty gadgets and effective skincare solutions. They appreciate items that are aesthetically pleasing, such as those made of ceramic, and effective in improving scents and ambiance. Positive experiences include the effectiveness of various skincare products, particularly those that hydrate and calm the skin without irritation. The user values packaging that enhances hygiene, such as individual packets for serums, and consistently recommends products that perform well and meet their skincare needs, particularly in relation to anti-aging and moisturizing properties.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Despite mainly positive feedback, the user has encountered concerns regarding the expiration dates of some products. Items received with significantly shorter shelf lives were particularly disappointing, leading to frustrations about product freshness. There were also negative experiences with specific masks that were considered too thick and difficult to use, resulting in wasted product and dissatisfaction. This disappointment reflected a lack of alignment between expectations and actual product performance, particularly with cosmetics that did not absorb well and left excessive residue.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user demonstrates a clear preference for high-quality beauty and skincare products that provide effective results and a pleasant sensory experience. Their enthusiasm for functional beauty gadgets and effective skincare is evident, but their experience has been marred by issues related to product expiration and specific formulation disappointments. Overall, while the user enjoys many aspects of their purchases, including aesthetics and performance, there remain concerns that could affect their future buying decisions, specifically regarding product freshness and formulation adequacy.

target_interaction.title: So far so good!
target_interaction.text:
I’m at day 4 and I do believe it’s working!
I have sensitive skin but this doesn’t irritate or make my skin dry at all.

I have redness around cheeks and between my eyebrows and this certainly helps to reduce the redness.
I like it’s not sticky or oily and absorb into skin well.
I have to see how long my skin keeps less redness after 7 days.
I will update the review!
